<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2179</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Road not taken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Straße nicht genommen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La route non prise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrada não feita exame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La strada non presa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο που δεν λαμβάνεται δρόμος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El camino no tomado</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a reading comprehension worksheet for 11th grade students to be done after reading Robert Frost's "The Road not Taken"</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wriiten expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Leseerfassenbogen, damit 11. 
Gradkursteilnehmer nach der "nicht" genommenen worden Straße des 
Messwertrobert Frosts getan werden können</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau de compréhension de lecture 
pour que les 11èmes étudiants de catégorie soient faits après la 
route du gel de Robert de lecture "non prise"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha da compreensão da leitura para
que os 11os estudantes da classe sejam feitos após a estrada da geada
de Robert da leitura "não feita exame"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro di comprensione della
lettura affinchè gli undicesimi allievi del grado sia fatta dopo la 
strada del gelo del Robert della lettura "non presa"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας κατανόησης ανάγνωσης 
για τους 11ους σπουδαστές βαθμού που γίνονται μετά από να 
διαβάσει δρόμο Robert Frost's "τον που δεν λαμβάνεται"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo de la comprensión de
la lectura para que los 11mos estudiantes del grado sean hechos 
después del camino de la helada de Roberto de la lectura "no tomado"</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wriiten Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">wriiten l'expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wriiten a expressão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">wriiten l'espressione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">poesía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">wriiten la expresión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
